title: FS: T206 - SGC Graded Commons - Some Less Common Backs - REDUCED
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - SGC Graded Commons - Some Less Common Backs - REDUCED
posts.post_content:
I'm selling off some of my T206 doubles. The following are available:

Jap Barbeau, Polar Bear, SGC 50/4, no creases, nice color, $55  SOLD
 Bill Bergen (Catching), El Principe de Gales, SGC 30/2, no creases, great corners, miscut, grade to small disturbance near "P" in "Principe", $40 SOLD
Howie Camnitz (Hands Above Head), Sovereign 460, SGC 30/2, light creases, $50 SOLD
Bill Carrigan, Sovereign 350, SGC 50/4, nice color, $55 SOLD
Russ Ford, Sovereign 460, SGC 50/4, no creases, $95 SOLD
Art Fromme, Polar Bear, SGC 50/4, nice color, slight diamond cut, $55 SOLD
Dolly Gray, Piedmont 350, SGC 80/6, really nice, $200 SOLD
Buck Herzog (Boston), Piedmont 350-460/25, SGC 40/3, no creases, off center, WAS $45 NOW $40  SOLD
Joe Lake (New York), Sweet Caporal 150/Factory 649 Overprint, slight disturbance near "S" in "Sweet" reason for grade, bright white borders, $35 SOLD
Al Mattern, Polar Bear, SGC 40/3, sharp image and good color, no creases, WAS $45 NOW $40
George McQuillan (With Bat), Sweet Caporal 350/30, SGC 60/5, really nice, slight diamond cut $85 SOLD
Jeff Pfeffer, Sweet Caporal 350-460/Factory 42 Overprint, SGC 50/4, great color, no creases, diamond cut, $45  SOLD
Oscar Stanage, Sovereign 350, SGC 30/2, no creases just rounded corners, very green, nice image, $35 SOLD


Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).  Cards will ship Monday (5/23) if payment is received.

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts. Please e-mail me at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested. 

Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE. I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME. I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS. THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
